## Carry Recipe
_Double Hammock Wiggleproof Version – Base Size – Traditional Sling Pass + Wiggleproof Pass + 2 Reinforcing Passes_

- Off center Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back with short tail over shoulder
- Spread chest pass with long tail
- Under baby’s leg and up for a Wiggleproof Pass
- Bunched or spread Reinforcing Passes over and under baby’s legs
- TIF
